languages.text: "Экая занятная сцена — нелюдь получает то, что заслужила! Посмотрим, посмеемся".
"Now this is a fine spectacle — the inhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."
languages.original_text: "Экая занятная сцена — нелюдь получает то, что заслужила! Посмотрим, посмеемся".

traits.locale_text: "What an amusing scene — the abhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What an amusing scene — the abhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Now this is a fine spectacle — the inhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Now this is a fine spectacle — the inhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Now this is a fine spectacle — the inhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “真是一出好戏！这个异形罪有应得！尽情欣赏，尽情欢笑吧。”
languages.original_text: "Now this is a fine spectacle — the inhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."

traits.locale_text: “真是一出好戏！这个异形罪有应得！尽情欣赏，尽情欢笑吧。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Qué buen espectáculo: la inhumana va a recibir su merecido! Observaremos y nos reiremos».
languages.original_text: "Now this is a fine spectacle — the inhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué buen espectáculo: la inhumana va a recibir su merecido! Observaremos y nos reiremos».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Voilà un beau spectacle qui s'annonce : la non-humaine va enfin se faire rendre la monnaie de sa pièce ! On va bien rire, je le sens. »
languages.original_text: "Now this is a fine spectacle — the inhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."

traits.locale_text: « Voilà un beau spectacle qui s'annonce : l'inhumaine va enfin se faire rendre la monnaie de sa pièce ! On va bien rire, je le sens. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Das nenne ich mal ein Spektakel – der Nicht-Mensch bekommt, was er verdient. Lasst uns alle zusehen und lachen."
languages.original_text: "Now this is a fine spectacle — the inhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."

traits.locale_text: "Das nenne ich mal ein Spektakel – der Nicht-Mensch bekommt, was er verdient. Lasst uns alle zusehen und lachen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「さあ、これは素晴らしい見世物だ。人ならぬ者にはお似合いだ！みんなで見て笑おうじゃないか」
languages.original_text: "Now this is a fine spectacle — the inhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."

traits.locale_text: 「さあ、これは素晴らしい見世物だ。人ならぬ者にはお似合いだ！みんなで見て笑おうじゃないか」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ne hoş bir gösteri, insan dışı hak ettiğini alıyor! Hep birlikte izleyip eğlenelim."
languages.original_text: "Now this is a fine spectacle — the inhuman gets what she deserves! Let us all watch and laugh."

traits.locale_text: "Ne hoş bir gösteri, insan dışı hak ettiğini alıyor! Hep birlikte izleyip eğlenelim."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
